title: Autofilled to Support - No Protection 3rd time
body:
I've been autofilled in ranked games 3 times since the new patch and all 3 times I don't get the autofill protection after. 
I've submitted a bug issue twice now.

replies.body: Wow that sounds pretty shitty tbh. I don't think autofill should happen to someone that many times in a row, but it might if [**certain roles like support are really lacking**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h6).
Autofill protection isn't guaranteed after you were filled. If you willingly played support or fill, you'd have a greater chance to have autofill protection as opposed to being filled into support.
